                                 break;                              case 8:                                  if (Mail.Money > 0)                                  {                                      Plr.AddMoney(Mail.Money);                                      Mail.Money = 0;                                  }                                  // Take as many items as you can before inventory is full                                  List<KeyValuePair<uint' ushort>> ToRemove = new List<KeyValuePair<uint' ushort>>();                                    foreach (KeyValuePair<uint' ushort> curritem in Mail.Items)                                  {                                      UInt16 Slot = Plr.ItmInterface.GetFreeInventorySlot();                                      if (Slot == 0)                                      {                                          Plr.SendLocalizeString(""' GameData.Localized_text.TEXT_OVERAGE_CANT_TAKE_ATTACHMENTS);                                          break;                                      }                                      Plr.ItmInterface.CreateItem(curritem.Key' curritem.Value);                                      ToRemove.Add(curritem);                                  }                                    foreach (KeyValuePair<uint' ushort> remove in ToRemove)                                      Mail.Items.Remove(remove);                                    CharMgr.SaveMail(Mail);                                  Plr.MlInterface.SendMailUpdate(Mail);                                  Plr.MlInterface.SendMail(Mail);                                  break;                          }                      }                      break;              }
